text: <!channel> Say Hello to Matthew Curtis! Come on up to the 4th floor kitchen for bagels!
Just a reminder for 1pm! Come celebrate and give the Care team high fives in the 4th floor Kitchen.
<!channel> Care Assistant team will be showing work at 1:10! Get yourselves up here if curious

from Marcelino: Hi folks, we have a reveal event this evening for Sommely for a number of potential partners and investors. Our team has been working diligently over the last few weeks in preparation for this event. We’ll be setting up on the 4th floor west corner starting around 4:30. Folks won’t arrive till 5:30. If you get a chance, please tidy up that area before you leave. If you’d like to hang out for a bit and see our progress, you’re welcome to do so!
